languages.text: {n}Префект осекается от резкого звука, эхом отразившегося от стен залы. За толстыми стеклами окуляров глаза префекта сверкают недовольством, однако она быстро выпаливает:{/n} "По решению Вольного Торговца и с учетом ситуации приветственная церемония будет сокращена до краткого протокола".

{n}The prefect stops at the unceremonious sound reverberating throughout the room. Behind her thick ocular lenses, her eyes flash with displeasure. Catching herself, she quickly says,{/n} "In accordance with the Rogue Trader's prerogative to do so, the welcoming ceremony will be shortened to a brief formality."
languages.original_text: {n}Префект осекается от резкого звука, эхом отразившегося от стен залы. За толстыми стеклами окуляров глаза префекта сверкают недовольством, однако она быстро выпаливает:{/n} "По решению Вольного Торговца и с учетом ситуации приветственная церемония будет сокращена до краткого протокола".

traits.locale_text: {n}The prefect stops at the unceremonious sound reverberating throughout the room. Behind her thick ocular lenses, her eyes flash with displeasure. Still, she quickly says,{/n} "It is the Rogue Trader's prerogative to sanction the welcoming ceremony, which is to be shortened to a brief formality."

{n}The prefect stops at the unceremonious sound reverberating throughout the room. Behind the thick lenses, her eyes flash with displeasure, but she quickly says,{/n} "It is the Rogue Trader's prerogative to sanction an abridged version of the proceedings whenever appropriate..."

{n}The prefect stops at the unceremonious sound reverberating throughout the room. Behind her thick ocular lenses, her eyes flash with displeasure. Catching herself, she quickly says,{/n} "In accordance with the Rogue Trader's prerogative to do so, the welcoming ceremony will be shortened to a brief formality."

Catching herself, she quickly says,{/n} "In accordance with the Rogue Trader's prerogative to do so, the welcoming ceremony will be shortened to a brief formality."

{n}The prefect stops at the unceremonious sound reverberating throughout the room. Behind her thick ocular lenses, her eyes flash with displeasure, but she quickly says,{/n} "It is the Rogue Trader's prerogative to sanction an abridged version of the proceedings whenever appropriate..."

{n}The prefect stops at the unceremonious sound reverberating throughout the room. Behind her thick ocular lenses, her eyes flash with displeasure, but she quickly says,{/n} "It is the Rogue Trader's prerogative to sanction an abridged version of the proceedings whenever appropriate..."

{n}The prefect stops at the unceremonious sound reverberating throughout the room. Behind her thick ocular lenses, her eyes flash with displeasure, but she quickly says,{/n} "It is the Rogue Trader's prerogative to sanction an abridged version of the proceedings whenever appropriate..."

{n}The prefect stops at the unceremonious sound reverberating throughout the room. Behind her thick ocular lenses, her eyes flash with displeasure. Still, she quickly says,{/n} "It is the Rogue Trader's prerogative to sanction the welcoming ceremony, which is to be shortened to a brief formality."

languages.text: {n}La préfète s'interrompt alors que le son guttural bien peu protocolaire résonne à travers la pièce. Derrière les épaisses lentilles, un éclat de colère illumine son regard, mais elle se reprend rapidement :{/n} « En tant que {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}, il vous est tout à fait possible de préférer une version abrégée du cérémonial en vigueur... »
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect stops at the unceremonious sound reverberating throughout the room. Behind her thick ocular lenses, her eyes flash with displeasure. Catching herself, she quickly says,{/n} "In accordance with the Rogue Trader's prerogative to do so, the welcoming ceremony will be shortened to a brief formality."

traits.locale_text: {n}La préfète s'interrompt alors que le son guttural bien peu protocolaire résonne à travers la pièce. Derrière les épaisses lentilles, un éclat de colère illumine son regard, mais elle se reprend rapidement :{/n} « En tant que {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}, il vous est tout à fait possible de préférer une version abrégée du cérémonial en vigueur... »

languages.text: {n}La prefecta se detiene ante el sonido inapropiado que reverbera por la sala. Tras sus gruesas lentes oculares, sus ojos revelan su desagrado. Se repone rápidamente y dice:{/n} «Conforme a sus derechos como {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente, se empleará la versión abreviada del procedimiento».
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect stops at the unceremonious sound reverberating throughout the room. Behind her thick ocular lenses, her eyes flash with displeasure. Catching herself, she quickly says,{/n} "In accordance with the Rogue Trader's prerogative to do so, the welcoming ceremony will be shortened to a brief formality."

traits.locale_text: {n}La prefecta se detiene ante el sonido inapropiado que reverbera por la sala. Tras sus gruesas lentes oculares, sus ojos revelan su desagrado. Se repone rápidamente y dice:{/n} «Conforme a sus derechos como {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente, se empleará la versión abreviada del procedimiento».

languages.text: {n}你唐突的咳嗽声在整个房间中回荡。行政官住了口，宛如啤酒瓶底的镜片后面射来了她充满愠怒的目光。随后，她马上恢复了平静，再次开了口。{/n}“行商浪人确实有权提出这样的要求，欢迎仪式将即刻进行精简。”
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect stops at the unceremonious sound reverberating throughout the room. Behind her thick ocular lenses, her eyes flash with displeasure. Catching herself, she quickly says,{/n} "In accordance with the Rogue Trader's prerogative to do so, the welcoming ceremony will be shortened to a brief formality."

traits.locale_text: {n}你唐突的咳嗽声在整个房间中回荡。行政官住了口，宛如啤酒瓶底的镜片后面射来了她充满愠怒的目光。随后，她马上恢复了平静，再次开了口。{/n}“行商浪人确实有权提出这样的要求，欢迎仪式将即刻进行精简。”

languages.text: {n}Die Präfektin hält angesichts des ungebührlichen Geräuschs inne, das durch den Raum hallt. Hinter ihren dicken Okularlinsen funkeln ihre Augen verärgert. Schließlich erklärt sie rasch:{/n} "Im Einklang mit dem Privileg {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}, die Begrüßungszeremonie zu verkürzen, belassen wir es bei einer kurzen Formalität."
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect stops at the unceremonious sound reverberating throughout the room. Behind her thick ocular lenses, her eyes flash with displeasure. Catching herself, she quickly says,{/n} "In accordance with the Rogue Trader's prerogative to do so, the welcoming ceremony will be shortened to a brief formality."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Präfektin hält angesichts des ungebührlichen Geräuschs inne, das durch den Raum hallt. Hinter ihren dicken Okularlinsen funkeln ihre Augen verärgert. Schließlich erklärt sie rasch: "Im Einklang mit dem Privileg {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}, die Begrüßungszeremonie zu verkürzen, belassen wir es bei einer kurzen Formalität."

languages.text: {n}総監は部屋全体に響く無作法な音で中断する。分厚いレンズの向こうで、彼女の目が不機嫌に瞬き、すぐに言う。{/n}「儀式の短縮形式を認めるのはローグトレーダーの特権です…」
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect stops at the unceremonious sound reverberating throughout the room. Behind her thick ocular lenses, her eyes flash with displeasure, but she quickly says,{/n} "It is the Rogue Trader's prerogative to sanction an abridged version of the proceedings whenever appropriate..."

traits.locale_text: {n}総監は部屋全体に響く無作法な音で中断する。分厚いレンズの向こうで、彼女の目が不機嫌に瞬き、すぐに言う。{/n}「儀式の短縮形式を認めるのはローグトレーダーの特権です…」

languages.text: {n}Prefekt, odada yankılanan bu hırıltıyı duyunca duruyor. Kalın oküler merceklerinin ardındaki gözleri hoşnutsuzlukla parlıyor. Kendine gelip konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Karşılama töreni, Hür Tacir'in bu husustaki ayrıcalığı doğrultusunda ufak bir formaliteden ibaret tutulacaktır."
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect stops at the unceremonious sound reverberating throughout the room. Behind her thick ocular lenses, her eyes flash with displeasure. Catching herself, she quickly says,{/n} "In accordance with the Rogue Trader's prerogative to do so, the welcoming ceremony will be shortened to a brief formality."

traits.locale_text: {n}Prefekt, odada yankılanan bu hırıltıyı duyunca duruyor. Kalın oküler merceklerinin ardındaki gözleri hoşnutsuzlukla parlıyor. Kendine gelip konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Karşılama töreni, Hür Tacir'in bu husustaki ayrıcalığı doğrultusunda ufak bir formaliteden ibaret tutulacaktır."
